name: docusaurus-openapi-typedoc
description: Docusaurus with OpenAPI and Typedoc and Lunr Search

scripts.docs:build: rm -rf ./docs2; mkdir docs2; NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 docusaurus clean-api-docs  all --all-versions ; NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 docusaurus  gen-api-docs all  --all-versions ;  DOCUSAURUS_IGNORE_SSG_WARNINGS=true docusaurus build --out-dir ./docs2; cp ./docs2/functions/index.html ./docs2/index.html
